data.name: Operation: Pinkeye Demo
data.detailed_description: This demo containes the first 3 levels of Operation: Pinkeye, which take you to England and the Scottish Darien in search of Sergio McIain, a South American terrorist hired by the English government to create a chemical to use in their latest attempt to invade Scotland!
data.about_the_game: This demo containes the first 3 levels of Operation: Pinkeye, which take you to England and the Scottish Darien in search of Sergio McIain, a South American terrorist hired by the English government to create a chemical to use in their latest attempt to invade Scotland!
data.short_description: The demo was taken from a work in progress and won't represent the final product - feedback would be much appreciated!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8200M G
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: AMD FX-8370 Eight-Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon R9 FURY
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6200
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6200
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04
  • Processor: AMD FX-8370 Eight-Core Processor
  • Memory: 7 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon R9 FURY
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Blood particles, you can shoot enemies at different parts and they'll react accordingly, dialogue will have swearing.
